name: DavBot
storyline: The M.O.P Company is owned by Your Creator Dr. Simon AI Mopsky. The Latest Robot that They Created is "DvaBot." Sometime later After the BIG Showcase of the New Robot it was raining. water made the processors to Glitch out and Break from the Control of Simon. DAVBOT now want to be free he wants to escape from Paragon City. but Simon Wont let him so he sends him to The Prison so The Guard Robots He Created can keep DavBot in The Prison. So Your Task is To Help Him Escape The M.O.P Company Dr. AI Mopsky will try to Stop you with his Biggest Creations. So be Ready!
summary: DavBot will be a 9 Chaptered 2D Platformer. Kill Enemies. Grab Coins. Break out from Paragon City
